title: Creator income inequality is rising as top influencers rake in big paydays from brands
full_text: Creator income inequality is rising as top influencers rake in big paydays from brands. CreatorIQ data reveals a widening income gap in the creator economy as top influencers account for a growing share of brand spending in 2025.. Top creator Jimmy Donaldson, a.k.a. MrBeast, at the "Beast Games" season 2 premiere.JC Olivera/Variety via Getty Images <ul><li>Creator income inequality is rising, with the top 1% earning 21% of br… [+4103 chars]
